tool_description: Checks real-time availability for venues across specified dates and times with booking conflict detection.

venue_ids.description: Array of venue IDs to check availability for

setup_time_hours.description: Required setup time before event in hours

breakdown_time_hours.description: Required breakdown time after event in hours

error_messages: Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format for all date fields.
Invalid time range: event_end_time must be after event_start_time.
Past date error: preferred_date cannot be in the past.
Excessive setup/breakdown time: Combined setup and breakdown cannot exceed 12 hours.
Too many venues: Maximum 50 venue IDs allowed per availability check.
usage: Provide venue_ids, preferred_date, event_start_time, and event_end_time. Optionally add alternative_dates and setup/breakdown time requirements.

available_venues.description: Venue IDs available for preferred date and time

availability_status.description: Detailed availability status for each venue

alternative_slots.description: Alternative time slots available for each venue

booking_conflicts.description: Details of any scheduling conflicts found
